insert into vcc_loan_info (LOAN_NO, ORDER_NO, RELATIVE_LOAN_NO, CUST_ID, CARD_NO, INTEREST_RATE, SERVICE_FEE_RATE, OVERDUE_RATE, RETURN_FEE_RATE, LOAN_AMOUNT, RETURN_FEE, OVERDUE_MAMT_RATE, OVERDUE_MAMT_FEE, STATUS, REPAY_METHOD, OVERDUE_FLAG, OVERDUE_DAYS, LOAN_DATE, DEADLINE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION) values
(#{item.loanNo}, #{item.orderNo}, NULL, #{item.custId}, #{item.cardNo}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{item.status}, NULL, #{item.overdueFlag}, NULL, #{item.loanDate}, NULL, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, '1')

mapper.update:
update vcc_loan_info
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATIVE_LOAN_NO = #{relativeLoanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEREST_RATE = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SERVICE_FEE_RATE = #{serviceFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_RATE = #{overdueRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_FEE_RATE = #{returnFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAN_AMOUNT = #{loanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURN_FEE = #{returnFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_MAMT_RATE = #{overdueMamtRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_MAMT_FEE = #{overdueMamtFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
REPAY_METHOD = #{repayMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVERDUE_FLAG = #{overdueFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
OVERDUE_DAYS = #{overdueDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOAN_DATE = #{loanDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where LOAN_NO = #{loanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
